data.title: George Padmore - The Gold Coast Revolution
data.meta_description: George Padmore--The Gold Coast Revolution[1] - Free ebook download as PDF File (.pdf), Text File (.txt) or read book online for free. This document provides an introduction and overview of the book "The Gold Coast Revolution" by George Padmore. It summarizes the book's purpose, which is to trace the evolution of Gold Coast nationalism from the foundation of the Ashanti Confederacy to the emergence of the Convention People's Party. It discusses the roots of Gold Coast nationalism in traditional political institutions and the country's name change to Ghana. It also outlines the five stages of British colonial policy, beginning with a dictatorship and culminating in universal suffrage and a legislative council with an elected majority.
